code: import"./qrcode.css";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import useFetch from"../../hooks/useFetch.js";import QRCode from"qrcode";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Qrcode=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const id=location.pathname.split("/")[3];const{data,loading,error,reFetchData}=useFetch("/bookingorder/monuments/book/".concat(location.state.bid,"/qr"));const[src,setSrc]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{QRCode.toDataURL("name : ".concat(data.name,", city: ").concat(data.city,", address: ").concat(data.address,", no.of adults: ").concat(data.adult,", no.of children: ").concat(data.children,", total fee: ").concat(data.total_fee,", email: ").concat(data.email)).then(i=>{setSrc(i);});});const redirect=()=>{navigate("/");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"qr_holder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"data_holder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"tick",src:"https://res.cloudinary.com/drs7nvxpy/image/upload/v1676469185/entry_way/tick-icon-sign-symbol-design-free-png_xuxky5.webp",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"congratulations!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"You have booked your ticket"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"download the ticket and scan the qr code at the monument entrance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Happy Holiday"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"qrcode_img",src:src,alt:"none"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"red",onClick:redirect,children:"ok"})})]});};export default Qrcode;
